plot: The Podi-Snatcher from outer space comes to Podipods Land and steals a new Pod growing on the Old Tree. To rescue the Pod, the Podipods must come down to Earth and chase the Podi-Snatcher all over the world.
title: Podipods Around the World Adventures
plot_es: The Podi-Snatcher from outer space comes to Podipods Land and steals a new Pod growing on the Old Tree. To rescue the Pod, the Podipods must come down to Earth and chase the Podi-Snatcher all over the world.
plot_en: The Podi-Snatcher from outer space comes to Podipods Land and steals a new Pod growing on the Old Tree. To rescue the Pod, the Podipods must come down to Earth and chase the Podi-Snatcher all over the world.
